content:

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-17: CPU 74% | Mem 79% | Disk Used 95% | Disk Busy 92% | Conns: N/A | Net: 7.9/6.9 Mbps
- stor-b-02: CPU 61% | Mem 71% | Disk Used 91% | Disk Busy 86% | Conns: N/A | Net: 6.1/5.5 Mbps
- stor-c-22: CPU 57% | Mem 68% | Disk Used 87% | Disk Busy 79% | Conns: N/A | Net: 5.0/4.7 Mbps
- meta-03: CPU 56% | Mem 84% | Disk Used 77% | Disk Busy 61% | Conns: N/A | Net: 2.6/2.2 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-1: active 45 | idle 10 | waiting 5 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 12ms
- pool-2: active 30 | idle 20 | waiting 2 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 50 | avg_wait: 8ms
- pool-3: active 15 | idle 25 | waiting 1 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 40 | avg_wait: 5ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 3.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1,200,000

### Alerts
- [WARNING] Disk SMART reallocations reported on stor-a-17: 2 disks replaced, 1 queued for maintenance
- [INFO] Rebalance jobs started: 7
- [INFO] Rebalance jobs completed: 6
- [INFO] Data moved during rebalance: 262 TB
- [INFO] Avg rebalance Mbps: 875
- [WARNING] Rebalance queue depth: 4
- [WARNING] Skew index: 1.15
- [WARNING] Snapshot verification failure on cold tier segment
- [INFO] One snapshot verification failed, re-snapshotted
- [INFO] Quota enforcement blocked writes for tenant 'ml-vision' for 22 minutes
- [INFO] Created runbook for quota alerts at 95% quota

### Deployments & Changes
- Firmware update applied to stor-a-17
- No kernel patches or rack power cycles today
- Network drops recorded: 15
- Audit log size: 76 GB

### Events
- Two disks in stor-a-17 reported SMART reallocations; replaced one immediately and queued the second for maintenance after confirming redundancy.
- Rebalance jobs increased to relieve hottest node at 95%+; capped per-node bandwidth to avoid saturating east-west links.
- Snapshot verification had one failure due to checksum mismatch on a cold tier segment; re-snapshotted and scheduled deeper scrub of affected placement groups.
- Quota enforcement blocked writes for tenant 'ml-vision' for 22 minutes until they purged expired artifacts; created runbook note for proactive alerts at 95% quota.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Dana K. 4 pages. 9 tickets. Status: Degraded but controlled; disk health and compaction backlog are main watch items, with ongoing rebalance throttling.
